item.title: Merging multiple MP4 videos with FFMPEG
item.description: I have a collection of video tutorials split into multiple sections and multiple clips in each section. I wanted to merge the files to one, so I can upload and download from services like Google Drive & Dropbox.

item.title: Poor man's pdf diff tool

item.title: Shell script to generate images for testing
item.description: Recently I was in need of generating sample images for no. of products in my db. I really hate to create a copy of image for each products in my db.
